author: kkbruce
body:
<!--

For Windows PowerShell 5.1 issues, suggestions, or feature requests please use the following link instead:
Windows PowerShell [UserVoice](https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)

This repository is **ONLY** for PowerShell Core 6 issues.

- Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/known-issues-ps6?view=powershell-6).

-->

# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
Get-DnsClient
Get-DnsClientServerAddress
```

# Expected behavior

`Get-DnsClient` output format correct.
`Get-DnsClientServerAddress` output format correct.

# Actual behavior

`Get-DnsClient` output format incorrect.

```
InterfaceAlias               Interface ConnectionSpecificSuffix ConnectionSpecificSuffix RegisterThisConn UseSuffixWhen
                             Index                              SearchList               ectionsAddress   Registering
--------------               --------- ------------------------ ------------------------ ---------------- -------------
乙太網路                                 8                          {}                       True             False
乙太網路 3                              12 tw.xxx.corp         {}                       True             False
Wi-Fi                                4 tw.xxx.corp         {}                       True             False
區域連線* 9                             16                          {}                       True             False
區域連線* 10                             7                          {}                       True             False
藍牙網路連線                              18                          {}                       True             False
Loopback Pseudo-Interface 1          1                          {}                       True             False
vEthernet (Default Switch)          30                          {}                       False            False
vEthernet (nat)                     19                          {}                       False            False
```

`Get-DnsClientServerAddress` output format incorrect.

```
InterfaceAlias               Interface Address ServerAddresses
                             Index     Family
--------------               --------- ------- ---------------
乙太網路                                 8 IPv4    {}
乙太網路                                 8 IPv6    {fec0:0:0:ffff::1, fec0:0:0:ffff::2, fec0:0:0:ffff::3}
乙太網路 3                              12 IPv4    {172.21.250.101, 172.21.250.102}
乙太網路 3                              12 IPv6    {}
Wi-Fi                                4 IPv4    {172.21.250.101, 172.21.250.102}
Wi-Fi                                4 IPv6    {}
區域連線* 9                             16 IPv4    {}
區域連線* 9                             16 IPv6    {fec0:0:0:ffff::1, fec0:0:0:ffff::2, fec0:0:0:ffff::3}
區域連線* 10                             7 IPv4    {}
區域連線* 10                             7 IPv6    {fec0:0:0:ffff::1, fec0:0:0:ffff::2, fec0:0:0:ffff::3}
藍牙網路連線                              18 IPv4    {}
藍牙網路連線                              18 IPv6    {fec0:0:0:ffff::1, fec0:0:0:ffff::2, fec0:0:0:ffff::3}
Loopback Pseudo-Interface 1          1 IPv4    {}
Loopback Pseudo-Interface 1          1 IPv6    {fec0:0:0:ffff::1, fec0:0:0:ffff::2, fec0:0:0:ffff::3}
vEthernet (Default Switch)          30 IPv4    {}
vEthernet (Default Switch)          30 IPv6    {fec0:0:0:ffff::1, fec0:0:0:ffff::2, fec0:0:0:ffff::3}
vEthernet (nat)                     19 IPv4    {}
vEthernet (nat)                     19 IPv6    {fec0:0:0:ffff::1, fec0:0:0:ffff::2, fec0:0:0:ffff::3}
```

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.2.3
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.2.3
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.18362
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @kkbruce The cmdlets is not in the repository. Please use Windows 10 Feedback tool or UserVoice site.

comments.author: kkbruce
comments.body:
@iSazonov thank you for your reminder. I feedback to https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell/suggestions/38966968-get-dnsclient-and-get-dnsclientserveraddress-outpu
Windows Server
Get-DnsClient and Get-DnsClientServerAddress output format incorrect
I feedback with https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/10987 Get-DnsClient and Get-DnsClientServerAddress output format incorrect.You can see the markdown render of github issue.

title: Get-DnsClient and Get-DnsClientServerAddress output format incorrect
